books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
books.description: A comprehensive guide to becoming a pragmatic and effective programmer.

books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: Learn how to write clean, maintainable, and scalable code.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian regime and its impact on society.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: An exploration of the history and evolution of humankind.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
books.author: Mark Manson
books.description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of wealth, love, and the American dream in the 1920s.

books.title: Guns, Germs, and Steel
books.author: Jared Diamond
books.description: A historical analysis of the factors that shaped the modern world, including geography, culture, and biology.

genres.name: Technology

genres.name: Fiction

genres.name: History
